entry.title: A Proposed Compromise to the Block Size Limit
entry.summary: On June 27th, 2015 at 11:29:07 GMT-04:00, Randi Joseph wrote a message addressing concerns about the recommendation of Full Replace-by-Fee (RBF) to mining pools. In response, the writer suggests that if using Bitcoin without Full RBF is considered imprudent, then people are using it in a recklessly dangerous way. The message is signed with a PGP signature.
